lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony, among others, has been mentioned in rumors, but Hornacek said he was planning on leading the same roster after the All-Star game break.
snippet: Carmelo Anthony, among others, has been mentioned in rumors, but Hornacek said he was planning on leading the same roster after the All-Star game break....

headline.main: Coach Jeff Hornacek Expects Knicks to Remain Intact at Trade Deadline
